patterns: what is the full form of kdpit
responses: Smt. Kundanben Dinsha Patel Department of Information Technology , established in 2000 which offers 120 seats in B. Tech. and 15 seats in PGDCS.
Established in 2000, the Smt. Kundanben Dinsha Patel Department of Information Technology offers 120 B. Tech. seats and 15 PGDCS seats.

patterns: how is the academics of kdpit
responses: KDPIT provides a wide range of course modules and syllabuses for students enrolled in various semesters in order to satisfy the demands of the modern market.
For students enrolled in various semesters, KDPIT offers a wide variety of course modules and syllabuses to meet the needs of the current market.

patterns: what are the vision and mission of kdpit
what are the visions and missions
responses: Vision: To become a leading department for quality education, research and development in the field of Information Technology. Mission: To prepare next-generation technocrats for societal upliftment. To inculcate moral and ethical values in the students for building vibrant nation.
